items.name: Empanadas
items.description: Corn dough filled with chicken tinga and cheese. Topped with cabbage, pico de gallo and crema fresca.

items.name: Sopes
items.description: Three handmade corn tortillas topped with refried beans, potato, chorizo, lettuce, and salsa.

items.name: Tacos Dorados (Flautas)
items.description: 2 homemade corn tortillas rolled and fried — beef, chicken or veggie. Lunch only.

items.name: Chorinacho
items.description: Layers of tortilla chips and chorizo, served with pico de gallo, cheese and crema fresca.

items.name: Five Layer Nacho Dip
items.description: Refried beans, guacamole, sour cream, cheddar, salsa verde, queso fresco.

items.name: Chorizo Queso Fundido
items.description: Chorizo with homemade guajillo sauce and melted cheese. Served with tortillas.

items.name: Molletes
items.description: Open-faced bread with refried beans, cheddar, pico de gallo, salsa verde and crema.

items.name: Guacamole and Chips
items.description: House guacamole and tortilla chips.

items.name: Sopa del día
items.description: Chef's daily soup.

items.name: Sopa de Tortilla
items.description: Tomato & ancho chile soup with chicken, corn chips, cheddar, avocado, crema.

items.name: Nopales (Cactus Salad)
items.description: Butter lettuce, pickled nopales, red onions, pico de gallo, radish, guajillo vinaigrette.

items.name: Rio Alto Salad
items.description: Romaine, avocado, radishes, apples & red onions with lemon jalapeño dressing.

items.name: Huevos Rancheros
items.description: Two fried eggs on corn tortilla, refried beans, cheddar, salsa verde, rice, crema.

items.name: Chilaquiles Rio Style
items.description: Corn tortilla chips in salsa, topped with chicken, cheese, onion & crema.

items.name: Amigas Enchiladas
items.description: Corn tortillas filled with Chicken Tinga / Beef Brisket / Pork / Veggie. Choice of salsa.

items.name: Carne Asada
items.description: 7oz Mexican-style grilled steak with sautéed onions, nopales, 6oz chorizo; rice, pico and tortillas.

items.name: Mole
items.description: Stuffed duck with traditional mole. May contain nuts. Served with rice & beans.

items.name: Chile Relleno
items.description: Stuffed poblano with smoked gouda; ancho chile tomato sauce; rice & beans.

items.name: Azteca Lasagna
items.description: Corn tortillas, beef tenderloin, spinach, smoked gouda & mascarpone, roasted corn, poblano sauce.

items.name: Rio Alto Sombrero Platter
items.description: A taste of antojitos: empanadas, tacos, sope, enchiladas, soft tacos with pico & guac.

items.name: Three Farmers Torta
items.description: Shredded chicken tinga, refried beans, lettuce, tomato, avocado, mayo.

items.name: Ranchero Torta
items.description: Slow-cooked marinated beef, refried beans, lettuce, tomato, avocado, chipotle mayo.

items.name: Crazy Horse
items.description: Refried beans, caramelized onions, roasted pineapple, chipotle mayo. Choice of pork or chorizo.

items.name: Rio Alto Burritos
items.description: Whole wheat tortilla with beans, rice, chipotle mayo, choice of protein. Lunch only.

items.name: Beef Taco
items.description: Shredded beef, cilantro, onions, lime.

items.name: Chicken Taco
items.description: Chicken tinga, cilantro, onions, roasted pineapple.

items.name: Pork Taco
items.description: Roasted pineapple, salsa verde, lime.

items.name: Chorizo Taco
items.description: Chorizo, onions, cilantro, lime.

items.name: Beans Taco
items.description: Refried beans, feta cheese, pico de gallo.

items.name: Veggie Taco
items.description: Mushrooms, roasted poblano, roasted corn, crema fresca, feta.

items.name: Pico de gallo
items.description: Small

items.name: Crema fresca
items.description: Small

items.name: Soft drinks
items.description: Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Ginger Ale, Agua de Jamaica, Horchata, Sidral

items.name: Imported Mexican Beer
items.description: Corona, Negra Modelo, Modelo Especial, Pacifico, Dos Equis

items.name: Margarita (Lime)
items.description: Tequila, fresh lime, orange liqueur

items.name: Churros
items.description: Cinnamon sugar, cream
